name: Attack of the Gruns
description:
Attack of the Gruns

TOJAM 2020

WASD to Move. Point + Click with mouse to fire.

Defend the Prysum from the Gruns alongside other players - but each player is trapped in their own planar slice! You can't join your compatriots in their slice of the battlefield, so keep an eye on the minimap to coordinate!

Shooting an enemy from a different plane (denoted by hue) will deal only partial damage, so try to focus your fire on the targets that match your character.

NOTE: to host you will need to forward port 7777 on your router to host the game. You can play alone without internet by hosting.
